headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for PPG Industries (PPG) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: PPG Industries (PPG) Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -3.82% and +4.52%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: PPG Industries Logs Higher Quarterly Revenue on Higher Prices, Volume
summary: The Pittsburgh paint and coatings companyâ€™s revenue grew around 5% to $3.91 billion in the fourth quarter.

headline: PPG Industries: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.57 per share. The paint and coatings maker posted revenue of $3.91 billion in the period, which beat Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $3.74 billion.

headline: PPG reports fourth quarter and full-year 2025 financial results
summary: PITTSBURGH, January 27, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today reported financial results for the fourth quarter and full-year 2025.
